name: color-game
description: An out-of-box UI solution for enterprise applications

scripts.build: rm -rf node_modules/.cache/ src/.umi && NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider REACT_APP_ENV=dev PLATFORM=CNONTROL umi build || cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=dev umi build
scripts.build:dev: rm -rf node_modules/.cache/ src/.umi && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider REACT_APP_ENV=dev umi build || cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=dev umi build
scripts.build:test: rm -rf node_modules/.cache/ src/.umi && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider REACT_APP_ENV=test umi build || cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=test umi build
scripts.build:uat: rm -rf node_modules/.cache/ src/.umi && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider REACT_APP_ENV=uat umi build || cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=uat umi build
scripts.build:prd: rm -rf node_modules/.cache/ src/.umi && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider REACT_APP_ENV=prd umi build || cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=prd umi build
scripts.build:prd:local: rm -rf node_modules/.cache/ src/.umi && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider REACT_APP_ENV=prd umi build || umi build
scripts.dev1: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider PLATFORM=CNONTROL REACT_APP_ENV=dev MOCK=none UMI_ENV=dev umi dev --port=8801
scripts.dev2: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider PLATFORM=MERCHANT REACT_APP_ENV=dev MOCK=none UMI_ENV=dev umi dev  --port=8802
scripts.test1: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider PLATFORM=CNONTROL REACT_APP_ENV=test MOCK=none UMI_ENV=dev umi dev --port=8801
scripts.test2: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider PLATFORM=MERCHANT REACT_APP_ENV=test MOCK=none UMI_ENV=dev umi dev  --port=8802
scripts.prd1: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider PLATFORM=CNONTROL REACT_APP_ENV=prd MOCK=none UMI_ENV=dev umi dev --port=8801
scripts.prd2: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider PLATFORM=MERCHANT REACT_APP_ENV=prd MOCK=none UMI_ENV=dev umi dev  --port=8802
scripts.lint: umi g tmp && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:style && npm run lint:prettier && npm run tsc
scripts.start:dev: cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=dev MOCK=none UMI_ENV=dev umi dev
scripts.start:test: cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=test MOCK=none UMI_ENV=dev umi dev
